description: This source file implements functions related to HTTP Proxy Session handling, including processing client buffers, querying processing modes, receiving data from clients, handling session completion, sending responses to clients, accepting client connections, and authenticating sessions. It contains function implementations typical of a networking protocol handler in C.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpPsoGetClientBuffer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves a handle to the buffer descriptor for receiving data. Currently returns NULL.

methods.name: ULONG HttpPsoQueryForClient(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Determines the processing mode for incoming client data based on session and message state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoRecvFromClient(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Processes data received from the client, invoking the current request object to handle payloads.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoFinishedByClient(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Handles the event when the client connection is closed, invoking request object to close up.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoSendToClient(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMessage,ULONG ulSendFlags)
methods.description: Sends a response message to the client, outputting headers and body as specified.

methods.name: BOOL HttpPsoAcceptClient(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Accepts incoming client connections, delegating to WAM interface for acceptance.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpPsoAuthenticate(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Performs session authentication; currently a placeholder returning success.
